response.job_title: 📊 Reporting and Analytics Manager | 📉 Dataholic | 😎 People First | 📶 Data Driven
response.summary:
Multi-skilled Electrical Engineer with +7 years of experience in the reporting and workforce management for the BPO industry currently working as Reporting (BI) Manager. Focused on the development and growth of an specialized team, looking to ease the data acquisition and analysis for the executives.

I understand the data needs of the operations and am able to deeply analyse it finding patterns, with the capability to work under pressure and leading multiple projects while communicating assertively. I aim to work in a place where the requirements are high, letting me to improve not only as a professional but as part of the company.
response.skills: Análisis de datos, Liderazgo de equipos multidisciplinarios, Ingeniería de requisitos, Diseño de soluciones técnicas, Bases de datos

company.name: Atento
company.description: Atento is the largest provider of customer relationship management and business process outsourcing (CRM BPO) services in Latin America, and among the top five providers globally, based on revenues. Atento is also a leading provider of nearshoring CRM/BPO services to companies that carry out their activities in the United States. Since 1999, the company has developed its business model in 17 countries where it employs 135,000 people. Atento has over 400 clients to whom it offers a wide range of CRM/BPO services through multiple channels. Atento's clients are mostly leading multinational corporations in sectors such as telecommunications, banking and financial services, health, retail and public administrations, among others.  In 2019, Atento has been named one of the World's 25 Best Multinational Workplaces and one of the Best Multinationals to Work for in Latin America by Great Place to Work®.
